description.p: Ben'nir tend to be daunting, looking almost dreamlike. Their physique closeley resembles those of elves, however they tend to be mor beautiful and endearing to the human eye.
Ben'nir are the children of long dead stars, that have been sent to the mortal realm to explore and quench the curiosity of their ancestors and bring light into every aspect of creation.
Ben'nir tend to be crafty marksmen and powerful magicians. So they often take the role of individuals that are kind of separated from their society.
Ben'nir take names from the societies they interact with, but pronounce them in a more guttural and primordial way, hence the different sound of many names.

Male:Leo, A'ira, 'ariel, Ga'anagan
Female:Rea, Gal'den, An'ara, 'aria
Ben'nir are the children of stars.

Ability Score Increase.Your Charisma score increases by 3, and your Dexterity or Strength score increases by 2.
Age.Ben'nir being the children of stars are unable to age from the point they are created at. Otherwise they are immortal.
Alignment.Hence having no affiliation with the world, Ben'nir tend towards chaotic and neutral alignments.
Size.Ben'nir are the same size and build as humans. Your size is Medium.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Wings.Your spectral wings grant you a flying speed of 50 feet.
Stealthy.You're biology closely resembles that of a chameleon. You're body is adapted to hide in virtually every environment.You have proficiency in the Stealth skill.
Empowerment.Ben'nir have an empowered Lifeforce that grants them excelled healing. After a short or long rest you gain temporary hit points equal to twice your level + your Constitution mod. Also if you lose any part of your body, it will regenerate over the course of a day. Any spells that would cause the caster to take damage deal half that rounded up.
Starchild.You are a Starchild. You do not need to eat, drink, breathe, or sleep. You never make Endurance checks to resist the effect of starvation, thirst, exhaustion, or suffocation. However you still benefit from short and long rests. All other conditions and effects affect you normally.
Radiant Origin.You know the Produce Flame cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the Hex spell at will as a 2nd-level spell. Once you reach 5th level, you can also cast the Alter Self at will. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
Languages.You can speak, read, and write Common and two extra languages of your choice.
Your pair of spectral wings grant you a flying speed of 50 feet.
